title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - MSFS AutoFPS - 0.4.1
description:
In this video we will have a look at MSFS AutoFPS which allows you to automatically adjust the quality settings of MSFS and ensure you can reach the predefined frames per second (FPS). This tool likely will resolve a lot of issue/challenges which you encountered when getting the max FPS out of your hardware when playing MSFS.

If you want to give the tool a try yourself after seeing this video go the the link below and download it as shown in the video:

https://github.com/ResetXPDR/MSFS2020_AutoFPS/releases/tag/V0.4.1
